greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Odd bisection of A264977.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8190
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
program: (PARI) a(n) = if(n<2, n, if(n%2, bitxor(a((n - 1)/2), a((n + 1)/2)), 2*a(n/2))); for(n=0, 150, print1(a(2*n + 1),", ")) \\ _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 28 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 25 2017
